name: Just Avoid The Ball
body:
### Download:
**Windows**: click here  
**Linux**: see requirements, download source files, run it: ```python2.7 game.py```

### Requirements:
**Linux**: Python2.7 & PyGame   
**Windows**: same as above for running from source files

### Description:
You're a blue rectangle. Every red ball is your enemy. Survive!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
